Package com.wizarpos.devices

Interface Summary
DeviceControl DeviceControl接口是所有设备Control的根类。所有的设备Control的接口 和实现类都必须继承至这个接口。 这个类定义了设备的close方法和cancel执行中的异步操作的方法。
DeviceManagerProvider DeviceManagerProvider is the interface for the implementation of the device manager provider.
OperationListener  
OperationResult Operation results are generated by a device implementation to notify the application of the completion of a requested operation.
TimeConstants This interface contains a number of useful constants for use with methods that accept a timeout as a parameter.
 

Class Summary
DeviceManager DeviceManager 是获得每个设备接口的入口。获取该对象不能使用new方法，可以通过getInstance方法获得。
DeviceManagerImpl  
 

Exception Summary
DeviceException An DeviceException is thrown when access problems are detected by the service controls.
